modName: Dragonball ki blast and power up
summary: changes fire ball type spells to ki blast from dbz and fire cloak is now a saiyanish power up
descriptionHtml:
Video just highlight right click and open in new tab

Ki Blast and Powerup
[youtube]VQJK3YftOWc[/youtube]

Coming soon Kamehameha wave
[youtube]whk4POitOz4Video[/youtube]

Multi Destructo Disc
[youtube]wfg3bA6HbKE[/youtube]

This mod changes some effects and sounds of certain spells to make them more dragonball.

the fire hand and fire cloak effect is now energy effect

all fire balls are now energy blasts complete with ki blast sound fx

fire ball impact effects have been tweeked to produce a large dust cloud on impact

fire cloak still functions normally but when activated you get a super saiyan like power up effect and goku sound for fun

Conflicts

all cloak spells will have goku activation noise once again shared files bah

fire storm and flames spell hand effect will be energy effect its an all or nothing situation and for me a ki blast looks cooler coming from an energy hand effect

fire storm and flames still work normally however flames actually gains the same dust cloud animation as the ki blast so personally i think it makes the flames spell even cooler

Files

both ki blast and power up

just ki blast

just power up

Download

copy data folder and paste into skyrim data folder 
i say copy instead of move so if you dont like it you can still look at the mod files as you got them and you know what files you need to remove to uninstall thats how i do it man is there a lot of junk in my data folder

Suggestions

i made the ki blast specifically for firebolt storm which is a hidden spell available through console commands. out of all the fire spells this one is the coolest by far and looks the best for the ki blast.

to get firebolt storm without using psb type this in your console player.addspell d488a 

and have fun!!!!
author: Rigormortician and Redman
